# Draft:Kanishk Mahawar

| birth_place   = Dausa, Rajasthan, India
| occupation    = Actor, Director, Singer, Entrepreneur
| known_for     = CEO of KDEC, roles in Jawan, Adipurush, KGF: Chapter 3
| height        = 1.69 m
| website       = [https://www.kanishkmahawar.tech www.kanishkmahawar.tech]
}}
Kanishk Mahawar (born January 30, 2007) is an Indian actor, director, singer, and entrepreneur. He is the founder and CEO of Krop Digital Media Entertainment Corporation (KDEC), known for its innovations in digital content production and music. Despite his young age, he has garnered attention for his contributions to both business and the entertainment industry.
Early Life and Education
Kanishk Mahawar was born in Dausa, Rajasthan, India. He is currently a student at St. Mary Convent School.
Career
Acting and Directing
Kanishk began his film journey as an actor and director. He is credited for his appearances in notable films such as Jawan (2023), Adipurush (2023), and KGF: Chapter 3 (2025).
Music and Podcasts
He released several musical works including the popular "Little Touch Better Monty Song" and "63 Sad Song by Kanishk."
Kanishk also hosts a podcast titled Listen the Songs with Me (K. Mahawar), which streams on JioSaavn.
Entrepreneurship
In 2022, he founded Krop Digital Media Entertainment Corporation (KDEC), a media and entertainment company based in India that specializes in digital content, music, short films, and podcasts. Under his leadership, KDEC grew into a significant player in the Indian digital entertainment industry.
Recognition
Kanishkâ€™s projects have received widespread media coverage across national and regional press, reflecting his influence as a rising content creator and entrepreneur.
